overview: TINANJALI, a song of life is a musical documentary feature film written, produced and directed by Susheel Kamotra in Malaysia. Based on the concepts of the book "Universal Face Theory, a theory of happiness," in this movie, the main character Pari, fights the battle within her own consciousness, the good and the bad, and carves a path towards freedom, self-healing, happiness, and ultimately gets self-realized.
title: Tinanjali
